rules_text: Search your library for a creature or land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
[i]“Phyrexia is the purity of true purpose.”
—Crovax[/i]
rules_text2: Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text2:
[i]“Dominaria's past is messy, imprecise—and artful.”
—Commodore Guff[/i]
